thread.title: Gwyneth Paltrow In Green Great Expectations Look
thread.title_full: Gwyneth Paltrow In Green Great Expectations Look

title: Gwyneth Paltrow In Green Great Expectations Look
text: Gwyneth Paltrow Re-Creates Her Iconic Green Look From Great Expectations Thursday 2, 2017 12:21 AM by Liana Satenstein Photo: Everett Collection Who can forget Gwyneth Paltrow as Estella, in the 1998 film Great Expectations ? The ’90s love tale may have received mixed reviews, but Paltrow’s looks in the film are still considered to be unanimously cool. Her most standout outfit in the film? An all-green Donna Karan cardigan and slinky skirt. To this day, the head-turning outfit is still making cameos on cult nostalgic Instagram accounts, serving as a reference for those wishing to replicate the same devil-may-care fashion statement . Loading View on Instagram It’s clear that Paltrow is still fond of the style. Just yesterday, she posted an Instagram of herself in an updated version of the ensemble. This time around, she swapped out her barely buttoned shirt for a peasant blouse, and opted for a tailored pair of trousers with a sharp pleat down the front instead of a slip skirt. In that fresh shade of green, the 44-year-old actress appeared just as confident and radiant as she did nearly two decades ago. In This Story: Gwyneth Paltrow Recommended For You
